summary: The “Corrections Officer Blake Schwarz Suicide Prevention Act of 2025” aims to address mental health concerns among corrections officers. It establishes a grant program for states and localities to implement mental health screenings and referrals to mental health care providers. The bill mandates the Bureau of Prisons to create a similar program. An Advisory Board will oversee the grant program and provide technical assistance. The bill authorizes funding for the program for fiscal years 2026-2030, with funds allocated to the Bureau of Prisons, states, localities, and the Advisory Board.
